paragraph1: Imagine having to turn away clients from your restaurant because of smell issues. Or having the co-owners at the condo you manage complain about bad smells that affect their ability to enjoy their own homes. Our carpet and upholstery cleaning includes a basic odour control service. We also offer advance odour control services for more complex cases, so you can protect your carpets and satisfy your clients who demand a clean and comfortable space.
listHeading1: Our professional odour control service includes the following:
listItem1: In-depth inspection of the root cause of the odour
listItem2: Product application to remove odours, reduce them or mask them
listItem3: Stain removal in relation to the odour
listHeading2: We also offer the following additional services:
listItem5: Ecological carpet and upholstery protector application
